placeholders.HERO_HEADING_TEXT: Walk This Way: Your Dog's New Best Friend
placeholders.HERO_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Connect with trusted dog walkers in your neighborhood for tail-wagging adventures
placeholders.FOOTER_TEXT: © 2023 PawTracks. All rights reserved. Keeping tails wagging and paws moving.
placeholders.NEWSLETTER_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Fetch the latest news, tips, and special offers for your furry friend
placeholders.ABOUT_MISSION_STATMENT: To provide safe, reliable, and joyful dog walking experiences that enrich the lives of both pets and their owners
placeholders.ABOUT_VISION_STATEMENT: Creating a world where every dog has access to exercise, socialization, and care, even when their owners are busy
placeholders.ABOUT_VALUES_STATEMENT: We value the safety and happiness of pets, the trust of owners, and the dedication of our walkers
placeholders.CONTACT_SUBHEADER_TEXT: Have a question or feedback? We're all ears!
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_01_TEXT: How do I book a dog walker?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_01_TEXT: Simply create an account, enter your dog's details, and choose from available walkers in your area. You can book one-time walks or set up recurring schedules.
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_02_TEXT: Are your dog walkers vetted and insured?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_02_TEXT: Absolutely! All our dog walkers undergo thorough background checks, training, and are fully insured for your peace of mind.
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_03_TEXT: How will I know my dog is safe during the walk?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_03_TEXT: Our app features real-time GPS tracking, photo updates, and detailed post-walk reports, so you're always in the know about your furry friend's adventure.
placeholders.FAQ_SUBHEADER_TEXT: Got questions? We've got answers! Check out our most common queries below.
